headline.main: Tennis, Yes; Swimming, Yes; But Skip Cigarettes, Please

byline.original: By CAPT. JAMES A. LOVELL Jr

docs.abstract: Former US astronaut Capt James A Lovell Jr, presently chmn of President's Council on Physical Fitness, discusses importance of physical fitness, especially for young; illus (M)
